thread.title: Local colleges: Bryant’s two goals help Elmira past Canton
thread.title_full: Local colleges: Bryant’s two goals help Elmira past Canton

title: Local colleges: Bryant’s two goals help Elmira past Canton
text:
ELMIRA — Michael Bryant scored the game’s final two goals as the Elmira College men’s soccer team rallied from a two-goal deficit to defeat SUNY Canton, 3-2, in a nonconference play Wednesday. 
The Kangaroos (4-10 overall) led 2-0 by the 16th minute after goals from Edward Malinoski. 
Elmira (5-4-3) cut the lead to 2-1 when Tony Barraco scored in the 46th minute. Bryant scored on a penalty kick in the 75th minute and then picked up the game-winning goal on a header in the 80th minute. 
nBrian Vazquez scored twice as the Herkimer County CC men’s soccer team topped Jefferson CC, 3-1, in a Region 3 game at Herkimer. Eric Gibbs scored for the Cannoneers (6-7). 
■ Teigha Ward netted two goals as the Herkimer County CC women’s soccer team blanked JCC (2-8-1), 4-0, in a Region 3 game at Herkimer. 
■ Cassie Birth posted 18 kills and 13 digs as the JCC (20-10, 4-2) volleyball team swept Tompkins-Cortland CC, 25-23, 25-12, 25-8, in a Mid-State Athletic Conference matchup in Cortland.
